entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:18 p.m. MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 9:00 PM CDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 48 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 80 gusting to 100 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blizzard. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the evening then snow. Near blizzard developing before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the evening then becoming north 60 gusting to 80 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
